channel.title: Npcdrops.tsm [317]
channel.description: This is what it looks like, the only thing I don't understand is the first #. 82:30 82 is the ID of the monster, but what is the 30? *Example* [code]#Lesser Demon 82:30 995:1300 445:15 1249:1[/code]

item.title: Npcdrops.tsm [317]
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

I’m confused on that part.
Lets say I wanted to add a steel dragon, which I did, in the npcConstant.tsm
I made the constant a dragon bone.
now I want to make like… runite bars… and dragon legs and stuff, would it look like this?

#Steel Dragon *NPCID*:*what goes here?* *Dragon Legs ID*:*what goes here?*

Read full topic
